name: Dimensional Phaser
description:
Don't click escape, it will crash the game.

W - Forwards

A - Left

S - Backwards/Brake

D - Right

R -  Restart

Tab - Phase cameras

Shift - Gear Up

Ctrl - Gear Down

Esc - Pause

After you finish playing please take some time to answer the form :                                        https://forms.gle/hCdtkCQThzmin5jT7
